New Records: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points
Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura connected on four of his five field goal attempts, including 2-from-3 from three-point range, in 11 minutes of action
Post-Match Reflections: I hope 2025 will be a year in which I can feel I've grown even more
The Grizzlies sit second in the NBA's Western Conference with 22 wins and 11 losses
Oklahoma City improved to 26-5 and extended their win streak to 11 on the back of a 35-point, seven-assist performance from star Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kawamura played his last G-League game of 2024 on Friday
He has started all eight of his games for the Hustle, averaging 14.9 points and 9.6 assists
Against the Thunder, he contributed three assists and three rebounds
